text: :Not to be confused with mourning. Morning is time period of the day from midnight to noon (5:00am-11:00am).timeanddate.com Morning is usually cooler than afternoon (12:00pm-3:00pm). ==Morning activities== Many people use the morning as a time to get ready for the day. This includes things like taking a shower, eating a meal (called breakfast, because you break the fast of the night) and getting dressed. Then many people go to work or school. Many people buy a morning newspaper to read about what is going on in the world. ==References== Category:Basic English 850 words Category:Parts of a day
title: Morning
